sermons.title: How To Lead A Soul To Christ
Husbanding
sermons.description: "Husbanding" is the most important role for the married man, yet we put relatively little effort into preparing for this responsibility. The core question is whether self is on the throne in our heart, or whether we have given that throne to God. Every husband will find this study challenging and beneficial.

sermons.title: The Blueprint of Your Home
sermons.description: Fathers, make a blueprint for your home. Be deliberate in providing spiritual and practical guidance to your family. The speaker uses a physical blueprint to help fathers identify key areas in which they need to direct their homes.
